title: Calculate your calories
sub title: How to calculate his basic metabolic rate and energy consumption?
explain daily calorie requirements: Daily calorie requirements are the amount of calories that must be added each day to ensure the proper functioning of the body. They depend on weight, sex, age, height and physical activity. In order to better control your weight, you need to calculate your daily caloric requirements and set up a balanced and adapted diet.
explain macronutrients: But calories are not the only things to take into account. The distribution of macronutrients should be taken into account. What are acronutrients? Macronutrients are the three groups of foods intended to provide energy to the body and ensure its vital functions: proteins, carbohydrates and fats. Since each nutrient has a distinct function in the body, we suggest you take stock of these 3 categories, in order to better guide you in your health goals, muscle building, weight gain or weight loss.
